2.text: Transfer the lemon juice into a large pitcher.

3.text: Pour 1 cup (225 g) of sugar into the lemon juice and stir to dissolve it.

4.text: Add 6 cups (1.4 L) of cool water to your pitcher.

5.text: Stir the lemonade with a large spoon to combine your ingredients.

6.text: Taste your lemonade to make sure you like it.

7.text: Serve your lemonade over ice so it’s chilled.

8.text: Store your lemonade in your refrigerator for up to 5 days.

9.text: Make sugar-free lemonade using a sugar substitute.

10.text: Use sparkling water to create fizzy lemonade.

11.text: Add 1 tbsp (6 g) of dried lavender to make lavender lemonade.

12.text: Mix in 1-2 cups (200-400 g) of pureed strawberries for berry lemonade.

13.text: Add 1  fl oz (30 mL) of vodka, rum, tequila, or bourbon for adult lemonade.

14.text: Garnish your glass with fresh herbs or fruit slices.
